EmailTemplate.name: Notice to Employee that Self Assessment is completed
EmailTemplate.subject: Self Assessment completed by {!Sales_Competency__c.User__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Sales_Competency__c.User__c},
Your Manager has been notified that your self assessment is finished, and has been transferred for manager assessment. You will not be able to access your Sales Competency assessment during this time. you will be notified when the Manager Assessment is ready for review.
-- sent automatically from Salesforce.com --
